FuncDef:
The pki file-format command configures the format of the certificate request file.
The undo pki file-format command restores the default configuration.
By default, the format of the certificate request file is PEM.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the certificate request file is in DER format.
-

Indicates that the certificate request file is in PEM format.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the pki file-format command to change the format of the generated certificate request file.
